cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on May 4, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2429, VA Police Improvement and Accountability Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 61 (Thursday, April 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Miss RICE of New York:
H.R. 2429.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H1721]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

title: VA Police Improvement and Accountability Act
